description:
Corduroy suiting feels so right for fall and we can't help but love the plush fabric in Stella McCartney's rich storm-blue hue. Made from pure cotton, this 'Robin' blazer is tailored for a smart, slim fit and has notched lapels and a double-breasted front - both draw the eye to the smallest part of your frame. The satin lining ensures it will easily layer over knitwear or camisoles. Shown here with:  Victoria Beckham Shoulder bag ,  Stella McCartney Slippers ,  Arme De L'Amour Earrings .
							 
									 
											 - Storm-blue cotton-corduroy 
											 - Button fastening at double-breasted front 
											 - 100% cotton; lining: 52% viscose, 48% cotton 
											 - Dry clean 
											 - Imported

Prada's crew-neck sweater looks like it has come straight from the '70s. It's been made in Italy from a wool-blend woven with light-catching metallic threads and has brown, blue and black stripes. Wear yours tucked into denim flares or a wrap skirt. Shown here with:  Prada Skirt ,  Prada Shoulder bag ,  Prada Sandals ,  Prada Belt .
							 
									 
											 - Brown, black and blue wool-blend 
											 - Slips on 
											 - 67% virgin wool 21% viscose, 12% metal fibers 
											 - Dry clean 
											 - Made in Italy

Aquazzura's founder Edgardo Osorio designs timelessly elegant shoes for women who want to look and feel their best, so it's no surprise that the brand's footwear has been spotted on stylish women like Amal Clooney, Beyoncé and Meghan Markle. These 'Ritz' pumps have been crafted in Italy from gold leather with a flattering d'Orsay silhouette and leg-elongating pointed toe. The lightly cushioned insole will keep you comfortable throughout the night. Shown here with:  Khaite Dress ,  The Row Clutch ,  Arme De L'Amour Earrings .
							 
									 
											 - Heel measures approximately 105mm/ 4 inches 
											 - Gold leather 
											 - Buckle-fastening ankle strap 
											 - Made in Italy

Oscar de la Renta's Creative Directors Fernando Garcia and Laura Kim prove each season just how apt they are at creating dramatic silhouettes that get you noticed, whether on the red carpet or when making an entrance at your next event. Cut from a navy silk-blend, this gown is trimmed along the shoulder with tulle saturated in shimmering sequins that elegantly fade from dark to light - the embellishments took over 148 hours to embroider onto the illusion neckline. The brand's signature cape-effect back languidly drapes to the floor and gracefully sweeps behind you wth each step. Shown here with:  Roger Vivier Clutch ,  Aquazzura Sandals .
							 
									 
											 - Navy silk-blend, sand tulle 
											 - Button-fastening keyhole at back 
											 - 94% silk, 6% spandex; trim: 100% polyamide 
											 - Dry clean 
											 - Imported
product_name: Cape-effect embellished tulle and silk-blend gown

description:
Defined by the brand's iconic burnished 'GG' logo plaque, Gucci's 'Victoire' boots will be one of the hardest-working pieces in your wardrobe for seasons to come. This pair has been made in Italy from glossy patent-leather and has a comfortable 60mm block heel and retro square toe. Wear them with everything from mini skirts to cropped denim. Shown here with:  Alexander Wang Jacket ,  Kith Hooded top ,  M.i.h Jeans Jeans ,  Gucci Shoulder bag .
							 
									 
											 - Heel measures approximately 60mm/ 2.5 inches 
											 - Black patent-leather 
											 - Zip fastening along side  
											 - Made in Italy

Prada's T-shirt is decorated with  nine  of the house's logos - every single one was seen on the Pre-Fall '18 runway. It's been made in Italy from cotton-jersey and has a boxy, loose shape. Our stylists like it with  wide-leg pants  and sneakers, but it'll look just as cool with leather mini skirts.  Shown here with:  Prada Shoulder bag ,  Prada Sneakers .
							 
									 
											 - Multicolored cotton-jersey  
											 - Slips on 
											 - 100% cotton 
											 - Hand wash 
											 - Made in Italy

Manebí's 'Hamptons' espadrilles are so comfortable you'll want to wear them all summer, both on vacation and back in the city. This pair is made from soft black suede and set on a chunky natural jute sole. Showcase the wrap-around ribbon ties with mini hemlines. Shown here with:  Dodo Bar Or Skirt ,  Loewe Shirt ,  Hunting Season Shoulder bag ,  Alighieri Necklace ,  Isabel Marant Rings .
							 
									 
											 - Sole measures approximately 40mm/ 1.5 inches 
											 - Black suede 
											 - Ties at ankle 
											 - Made in Spain Small to size. See Size & Fit notes.

The bib and cuffs on Stella McCartney's top are edged with knife-pleated satin trims that flutter prettily as you move. It's made from smooth cady in a bold red hue that's so flattering on all skin tones. Wear it tucked into pants or a midi skirt.  Shown here with:  Beaufille Skirt ,  Loewe Shoulder bag ,  Jil Sander Sandals ,  Paola Vilas Ring ,  Ellery Earrings .
							 
									 
											 - Red cady and satin 
											 - Concealed hook and zip fastening at back 
											 - 64% viscose, 32% acetate, 4% elastane; trim: 100% polyester 
											 - Dry clean 
											 - Designer color: Lover Red 
											 - Imported

Monse's deconstructed designs are so cool - women like Kendall Jenner and Sofia Richie are constantly photographed wearing the brand. Made from two different washes of denim, these jeans have an asymmetric waistband and straight-leg shape that's cropped just above the ankle. The distressed hems give them a lived-in look.  Shown here with:  Monse Blazer ,  Monse Top ,  Wandler Shoulder bag ,  Monse Pumps ,  Jennifer Fisher Earrings .
							 
									 
											 - Light and dark-blue denim 
											 - Partially concealed button fastenings along front 
											 - 100% cotton 
											 - Machine wash

Roger Vivier is best known for his ladylike pumps that once caught the eye of Queen Elizabeth II, but this espadrille interpretation is just what we want for the summer months. Made in Italy from black satin, this 'Flower Strass' pair is embellished with the iconic crystal-strewn buckle, inspired by '50s architecture. They are set on a 25mm jute sole reinforced with rubber. Shown here with:  Goldsign Jeans ,  Miu Miu Shirt ,  Marni Shoulder bag ,  Loewe Pouch ,  Sophie Buhai Earrings .
							 
									 
											 - Sole measures approximately 25mm/ 1 inch 
											 - Black satin  
											 - Slip on  
											 - Made in Italy

Converse's 'Chuck Taylor All Star' sneakers were originally created as a basketball shoe in the '70s but have since shed their sporty connotations. Made from textured-leather, this antique-rose version has oversized silver eyelets and plush velvet laces. Wear yours with everything from denim to mini skirts. Shown here with:  Saint Laurent T-shirt ,  Tibi Skirt ,  Tibi Blazer ,  Theory Shoulder bag ,  Sophie Buhai Earrings .
							 
									 
											 - Rubber sole measures approximately 25mm/ 1 inch 
											 - Antique-rose textured-leather 
											 - Lace-up front 
											 - Designer color: Rust Pink 
											 - Imported
product_name: Chuck Taylor All Star textured-leather sneakers

description:
If pumps aren't your thing, Converse's 'One Star Ox' sneakers are a perfect way to tap into the season’s metallic trend without sacrificing personal style or comfort. This pair is made from gold cracked-leather and features a contrasting cutout star on each side. Wear yours with everything from mini skirts to cropped jeans. Shown here with:  Tibi Sweater ,  RE/DONE Skirt ,  Nico Giani Mini Bag .
							 
									 
											 - Rubber sole measures approximately 25mm/ 1 inch 
											 - Gold cracked-leather, white textured-leather 
											 - Lace-up front 
											 - Imported
product_name: One Star Ox cutout cracked-leather sneakers
